header.title: Claude Code Guide
header.subtitle: Just 6 steps to start coding with AI

tips.title: 💡 Success Tips
tips.tip1: Take it slow. No need to rush!
tips.tip3: Don't panic at errors. There's always a solution

checkSection.title: Pre-installation Checklist
checkSection.description: Please check the following items before installing Claude Code:
checkList: Claude Pro Account - Pro plan ($20/month) or higher subscription required
About 30 minutes - For complete installation and setup

terminalGuide.title: Terminal Usage Guide
terminalGuide.description: Terminal is a program that controls your computer by entering commands.
terminalGuide.exampleTitle: This is what Terminal looks like when opened
closeMethods: Command (Cmd) ⌘ + W to close window only
Or type exit and press Enter ↵

terminalGuide.title: Command Prompt Usage Guide
terminalGuide.description: Command Prompt is a program that controls your computer by entering commands.
openMethods: Press Windows key + R, type "cmd" and press Enter ↵
Search "Command Prompt" or "cmd" in Start menu
Start menu → Windows System → Command Prompt
terminalGuide.exampleTitle: This is what Command Prompt looks like when opened
closeMethods: Click the X button on the window
Or type exit and press Enter ↵

confirmSection.prompt: If you've reviewed the content, click the complete button:

button.title: I understand - Next step!
